query: SELECT t.id, t.nome, COUNT(p.id) as qtd_permissoes FROM tipos_usuario t LEFT JOIN permissoes p ON t.nome = p.role WHERE t.ativo = 1 GROUP BY t.id, t.nome ORDER BY t.nome LIMIT 20
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT t.id, t.nome, COUNT(p.id) as qtd_permissoes FROM tipos_usuario t LEFT JOIN permissoes p ON t.nome = p.role WHERE t.ativo = 1 GROUP BY t.id, t.nome ORDER BY t.nome LIMIT 20
